name: Tricks o' Treats
description:
Welcome welcome!

Ever found yourself wanting something you can't have?

Well, you're in luck! We are hosting an event where the winner gets their wish granted. You just need to win AnDpRoVidEtHeKeyAtThEeNdOftHeGaMe ! 

The event will be hosted on Halloween Eve, so don't miss out! You can contact us at the links provided. <3

Until then! We'll be looking forward to your arrival!

Warning: contains graphic content, flashing lights, disturbing imagery, and other sensitive topics that may not be suitable for younger audiences. 

============================================

============================================

Dev Log:

Our second game! It was hell again lol but hope everyone enjoys. We're new to horror but hopefully we can get some spooks  :) This game has a bunch of bugs...probably. We'll patch those once we get our sanity back and find them, so feel free to let us know if you come across any. Thanks!
